channel.title: Multilingual on Xianmin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Multilingual on Xianmin's Blog

item.title: Multilingual Hugo Blog - How to Elegantly Manage Markdown Content
item.description: This article discusses file organization strategies for multilingual Hugo sites, URL structure optimization, and how to safely migrate existing blog content. It’s a useful reference for Hugo users looking to build multilingual blogs.
